All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminUserController
Controller handling user management operations for administrators.
ApiException
Custom exception for API-level errors.
Application
 
ApplicationController
Controller for student application queries.
ApplicationRepository
Repository interface for managing Application entities.
ApplicationResponse
DTO representing a student's job application in a safe, readable format.
ApplicationService
Service class for managing job applications.
AuthController
Controller that handles user authentication and registration.
AuthRequest
DTO carrying login credentials.
AuthResponse
DTO returned after successful authentication containing a JWT token.
AuthService
Service class responsible for authentication-related logic.
ChangePasswordRequest
DTO carrying data required to change a user's password.
CompanyOfferController
REST controller allowing a company user to manage its own job offers.
EmailService
Service responsible for sending emails.
ErrorResponse
Standard structure for error responses.
GlobalExceptionHandler
Global exception handler for REST controllers.
JobappBackendApplication
 
JwtAuthenticationFilter
Filter that intercepts each HTTP request to validate the presence and validity of a JWT token.
JwtService
Service for managing JWT (JSON Web Tokens).
Offer
Entity representing a job offer created by a company.
OfferRepository
Repository interface for managing Offer entities.
OfferRequest
DTO for creating or updating a job offer.
OfferResponse
DTO exposing job offer data to the frontend.
OfferService
Service class for managing job offers created by companies.
PasswordConfig
Configuration class responsible for providing the password encoder bean.
RegisterRequest
DTO used to register a new user account.
SecurityConfig
Configuration class for Spring Security.
StudentApplicationService
Service for handling student job applications: sends email and saves to database.
StudentOfferController
Controller for students to view and apply to job offers.
User
Entity representing a user in the JobApp system.
UserRepository
Repository interface for managing User entities.
UserResponse
DTO exposing user data without sensitive fields (e.g., password).
UserService
Service responsible for handling user-related operations such as authentication and registration.
